meta.title: Live Games - Company of Heroes 3
meta.description: Current live games in Company of Heroes 3

summaryTable.title: Live Games Summary
summaryTable.tooltip: Current multiplayer games in progress. Total Players are unique filtered. Keep in mind that there are probably a lot of players in lobby / searching / loading and doing other things. Custom games are not observable by default. Most likely there is much more custom games being played. Games are updated every 5 minutes.

noGames.title: No Live Games Detected
noGames.message: COH3 Stats may need to update after a recent game patch.
